message.body: Just registered for a sketching reptiles class at the Academy of Natural Sciences on Jan 22 6-9 PM. Not sure if this would be something of interest to u but thought I'd mention it.
It SOUNDS really cool but I'm a terrible artist!

I'm no Picasso either but I like reptiles and doodling. Not sure if I will be able to make it to ur ####### party. I should know for certain by this weekend. Regardless I think we are due for dinner/drinks!
It's cool, the ####### part was canceled anyway :/ Housewarming is still on though!
##### mentioned getting drinks with you as well, but we both have to wait until after finals are over!
Awe... Sorry about the bowling. If u want to go some evening with a really bad bowler, let me know. I could use the practice!
I'll take you up on that after I survive this term!
You will not only survive, You'll kick some ass!
